name: lavoiesl/doctrine-cache-detector
description: Library to detect which Doctrine Cache system is available and determine the best to use.

suggest.lavoiesl/apc-polyfill: Tiny script to create APC aliases when APCu is present but APC support is not emulated.
suggest.lavoiesl/doctrine-cache-provider: Library to add a Doctrine Provider to allow Doctrine Cache to connect to databases.
